tests.name: Project structure contains all required files

React components have proper JSX structure

Components use computed data, not hardcoded values

Data flows correctly from engine to components
Components handle missing or invalid data gracefully
Large datasets are handled efficiently
Meta-testing: Test suite validates all requirements

FIFO correctly handles partial lot sales
Stock splits are applied correctly to all lots
Transaction processing scales linearly
Market data generates realistic stock prices and sectors
Sample transactions are generated with proper structure
Portfolio engine calculates holdings correctly
Portfolio summary calculates total values correctly
Sector allocation calculates percentages correctly
Historical data generates plausible growth patterns
Performance metrics calculate risk-adjusted returns
Dividend calculations are included in portfolio metrics
All calculations use real computed values
